description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的第50个州，由夏威夷群岛组成，是美国唯一的群岛州，也是唯一位于美洲大陆之外的州。
description.en: The 50th state of the United States of America, composed of the Hawaiian Islands. It is the only U.S. state made up entirely of islands and the only one located outside of the Americas.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国，夏威夷州于1898年并入其领土，并于1959年成为其第50个州。
description.en: A federal republic in North America. The Hawaiian Islands were annexed as a territory in 1898 and became the 50th state in 1959.

description.zh-cn: 美国民主党政治人物，现任夏威夷州州长。
description.en: American Democratic politician, current Governor of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 美国民主党政治人物，现任夏威夷州副州长。
description.en: American Democratic politician, current Lieutenant Governor of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 美国的两个主要政党之一，在夏威夷州具有传统政治优势。
description.en: One of the two major political parties in the United States, traditionally holding a political advantage in the state of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 一个在1795年至1893年间统治夏威夷群岛的王国，后被推翻。
description.en: A kingdom that ruled the Hawaiian Islands from 1795 to 1893, before being overthrown.

description.zh-cn: 在夏威夷王国被推翻后、被美国吞并前成立的短暂共和国。
description.en: A short-lived republic established after the overthrow of the Kingdom of Hawaii and before its annexation by the United States.

description.zh-cn: 夏威夷在1898年被美国合并后成为其建制领地（准州），直到1959年正式成为一个州。
description.en: After being annexed by the United States in 1898, Hawaii became an incorporated territory until it officially became a state in 1959.

description.zh-cn: 夏威夷酋长，于1795年统一夏威夷群岛，建立夏威夷王国并自立为王。
description.en: A Hawaiian chief who unified the Hawaiian Islands in 1795, establishing the Kingdom of Hawaii and declaring himself king.

description.zh-cn: 夏威夷王国最后一位君主，于1893年被迫退位。
description.en: The last monarch of the Kingdom of Hawaii, who was forced to abdicate in 1893.

en: Overthrow of the Kingdom of Hawaii

description.zh-cn: 1893年，以美国商人和传教士为首的势力推翻了利留卡拉尼女王的统治，导致夏威夷王国终结。
description.en: In 1893, forces led by American businessmen and missionaries overthrew the rule of Queen Liliʻuokalani, leading to the end of the Kingdom of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 美国裔夏威夷政治家，曾任夏威夷共和国首任及唯一一任总统。
description.en: An American-descended Hawaiian politician who served as the first and only president of the Republic of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 美国第22和24任总统，曾在1893年反对吞并夏威夷。
description.en: The 22nd and 24th President of the United States, who opposed the annexation of Hawaii in 1893.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家。其海军航空兵于1941年袭击了珍珠港。
description.en: An East Asian country. Its naval air service attacked Pearl Harbor in 1941.

description.zh-cn: 位于夏威夷欧胡岛的港口，曾是美国太平洋舰队的基地。
description.en: A harbor on the island of Oahu, Hawaii, which was a base for the U.S. Pacific Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 1941年12月7日，日本海军航空兵对美国在夏威夷珍珠港的海军基地发动的突然袭击。
description.en: On December 7, 1941, the Imperial Japanese Navy Air Service launched a surprise military strike against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军的一支舰队，其在珍珠港的基地于1941年遭到日本袭击。
description.en: A fleet of the United States Navy, whose base at Pearl Harbor was attacked by Japan in 1941.

description.zh-cn: 美国第44任总统，出生于夏威夷，曾对夏威夷州通过同性婚姻法案表示赞赏。
description.en: The 44th President of the United States, born in Hawaii, who praised the state's passage of the same-sex marriage bill.

nodes.id: 夏威夷同性婚姻法案通过

zh-cn: 夏威夷同性婚姻法案通过

description.zh-cn: 2013年11月13日，夏威夷州立法机构通过了同性婚姻法案，使其成为美国第15个同性婚姻合法的州。
description.en: On November 13, 2013, the Hawaii state legislature passed a same-sex marriage bill, making it the 15th U.S. state to legalize same-sex marriage.

description.zh-cn: 夏威夷州的首府及最大都市。
description.en: The capital and largest city of the state of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 英国探险家、航海家，首位有记载的发现夏威夷群岛的欧洲人。
description.en: A British explorer and navigator, the first European recorded to have discovered the Hawaiian Islands.

description.zh-cn: 位于太平洋中部的火山群岛，组成了夏威夷州的主体。
description.en: A volcanic archipelago in the central Pacific Ocean that forms the main body of the state of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 1898年，美国国会通过决议，正式将夏威夷共和国并入美国，使其成为美国的领地。
description.en: In 1898, the U.S. Congress passed a resolution to formally annex the Republic of Hawaii, making it a territory of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 夏威夷于1959年8月21日正式成为美国的第50个州。
description.en: Hawaii officially became the 50th state of the United States on August 21, 1959.

description.zh-cn: 夏威夷在1898年被美国合并后成为其领地，直到1959年建州。
description.en: After being annexed by the United States in 1898, Hawaii was a U.S. territory until it achieved statehood in 1959.

description.zh-cn: 乔希·格林是夏威夷州现任州长。
description.en: Josh Green is the current Governor of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 西尔维娅·卢克是夏威夷州现任副州长。
description.en: Sylvia Luke is the current Lieutenant Governor of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲航海家詹姆斯·库克于1776年首次发现夏威夷群岛。
description.en: European navigator James Cook first discovered the Hawaiian Islands in 1776.

description.zh-cn: 1795年，卡美哈梅哈统一了夏威夷群岛，并建立了夏威夷王国。
description.en: In 1795, Kamehameha unified the Hawaiian Islands and founded the Kingdom of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 1893年的政变推翻了利留卡拉尼女王的统治，迫使其退位。
description.en: The 1893 coup overthrew the rule of Queen Liliʻuokalani, forcing her to abdicate.

description.zh-cn: 1893年的政变终结了夏威夷王国的存在。
description.en: The 1893 coup ended the existence of the Kingdom of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 夏威夷王国的覆灭为夏威夷共和国的成立创造了条件。
description.en: The fall of the Kingdom of Hawaii paved the way for the establishment of the Republic of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 桑福德·多尔于1894年成为夏威夷共和国临时政府的首任总统。
description.en: Sanford B. Dole became the first president of the provisional government of the Republic of Hawaii in 1894.

description.zh-cn: 格罗弗·克利夫兰总统上任后撤回了兼并夏威夷的条约，并明确表示反对兼并。
description.en: After taking office, President Grover Cleveland withdrew the treaty of annexation for Hawaii and explicitly stated his opposition to the annexation.

description.zh-cn: 1898年夏威夷被美国合并，夏威夷共和国终结。
description.en: The Republic of Hawaii ended when Hawaii was annexed by the United States in 1898.

description.zh-cn: 1898年夏威夷被美国合并，成为美国的夏威夷领地。
description.en: In 1898, Hawaii was annexed by the United States, becoming the U.S. Territory of Hawaii.

description.zh-cn: 1941年12月7日，日本海军航空兵袭击了珍珠港。
description.en: On December 7, 1941, the Imperial Japanese Navy Air Service attacked Pearl Harbor.

description.zh-cn: 日本对珍珠港的袭击重创了驻扎于此的美国太平洋舰队。
description.en: The Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor severely damaged the U.S. Pacific Fleet stationed there.

relationships.target: 夏威夷同性婚姻法案通过

description.zh-cn: 时任美国总统欧巴马对夏威夷州通过同性婚姻法案表示赞赏。
description.en: Then-U.S. President Barack Obama praised the state of Hawaii for passing the same-sex marriage bill.

description.zh-cn: 檀香山是夏威夷州的首府。
description.en: Honolulu is the capital of the State of Hawaii.
